segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dishes that she doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor is going to be completely ruined by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so careless, taking those cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they even realize how much trouble they could be in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy gets down safely before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to do something about this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just such a chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
